Page.name: Ring_Damage
Page.text: When used in combat, it inflicts 20 points of
damage on your opponent. Regardless of defense.
1 Silver Ring, 4 Polished Ruby, 8 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Ring of Damage Building

Page.name: Ring_Disengagement
Page.text: If used in combat, allows you to flee.
1 Silver Ring, 1 Polished Sapphire, 2 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Ring of Disengagement Building

Page.name: Ring_Power
Page.text: When used in combat, it inflicts 50 points of
damage on your opponent. Regardless of defense.
Note: the process produces 6 rings at a time.
1 Binding Stone, 10 Rings of Damage, 50 Death Essences.

Page.name: Ring_MDestr
Page.text: When used in combat, it removes 20 points of mana

Page.text: When used in combat, it removes 50 points of mana

Page.name: Med_Unicorn
Page.text: When worn, it increases your defense by 4.

Page.name: Med_Harv
Page.text: When worn while harvesting, it decreases the tool
breaking chances by 2, increases the experience
and money from random events, you won't stop
Random harvesting events can destroy it.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Gold Bars, 20 Red Toadstools,

Page.name: Med_Heaven
Page.text: When worn, if you have the hellspawn perk, instead
of hellspawning you lose the medallion.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Silver Bars, 20 White Chanterelles,

Page.name: Med_Life
Page.text: Increases your maximum material points by 30.
+2 Armor, +2 Accuracy, 5% chance to heal 25 hp
Knowledge needed: Medallion of Life Building

Page.name: Med_Mana
Page.text: Increases your maximum ethereal points by 20.
Knowledge needed: Medallion of Mana Building

Page.name: Med_Gather
Page.text: When worn, it increases your armor by 4 and your
accuracy by 4. When killing an opponent, if you
did the most damage, the items dropped are added
10 Moon Medallions, 1 Seridium Bar, 10 Fire Essences,

Page.name: Saving_Stone
Page.text: If you have this stone in inventory while mixing,
in case of critical failure you'll lose the stone
1 Refined Vegetal Mixture, 1 Mixture of Power,

Page.name: BigBookC
Page.text: Gives 60kxp in Crafting, can be read multiple times,
but you'll have to buy a new book each time.
Note: Requires 200 Action Points to mix.
Note: You'll lose 50 Action Points on critical
